snippet: A couple were returning to Wisconsin from Florida in a small twin-engine airplane when the husband, the only pilot aboard, had a heart attack.
abstract: Helen Collins, who is 80 years old, successfully lands a small twin-engine airplane in Sturgeon Bay, Wis, after her husband, the only pilot on board, suffers a heart attack.
lead_paragraph: A couple were returning to Wisconsin from Florida in a small twin-engine airplane when the husband, the only pilot aboard, had a heart attack.

headline.seo: Learning to Be a Pilot, With Fuel Running Out in Midair
headline.main: Learning to Be a Pilot, With Fuel Running Out
headline.print_headline: Learning to Be a Pilot, With Fuel Running Out
